Reviews.Title: jiayu G5
Reviews.Author: Bakur
Reviews.Content: I really like jiayu. But in terms of power and successful execution of the battery and memory jiayu g5 advanced better. Therefore, if possible, I'd like to ask you to provide for the sale - jiayu g5 advanced black and I would like to buy it. 3000mAh, 2GB RAM, 32GB ROM. I would be very grateful if I could buy it. Need more memory and larger batteries. Also, black looks better.

ProductInfo.Features:
Supports Bluetooth, Wi-Fi and GPS
Supports an external TF card up to 32GB
1280x720 screen resolution
MTK6589T quad-core 1.5GHz CPU
Android 4.2 operating system
ProductInfo.Name: JIAYU G3 Gorilla Glass Dual-core 4.5 inch IPS Screen 1280x720 Android 4.0 Dual Sim
